snippet: Jets Coach Rex Ryan would like his son to continue playing football despite the concussion he sustained last season in high school.
abstract: New York Jets coach Rex Ryan says he wants his son to continue playing football despite concussion he sustained last season in high school.
lead_paragraph: Jets Coach Rex Ryan would like his son to continue playing football despite the concussion he sustained last season in high school.

headline.main: Ryan Wants Son to Keep Playing Despite Concussion
headline.print_headline: Ryan Wants Son to Keep Playing Despite Concussion
